thread.section_title: Novotel Beijing Peace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice!
thread.title_full: Very nice! - Review of Novotel Beijing Peace, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Acevind
title: Very nice!
text:
Stayed for a week in the premium floor, and it was excellent. We traveled two familys, two adults and a child in every family. The lounge floor was perfect, the children where finished in half an hour and we adults stayed longer. The girls loved the pool (a little to cold for me...), and the hotel offered a very nice breakfast. The hotel very nice located; near subway and Wangfujing. Very good cleaning and service.
Thank you for a nice week!
